item.title: CMake, OpenCV, and Unit tests
item.description: For my ongoing Music OCR hobby project, I use OpenCV and C++. For inline text, I’ve been experimenting with OpenCV’s Tesseract support, which relies on the OCRTesseract class from OpenCV’s cv::text package.
